subject: Math
title: Completing the Square
description: Transform quadratics into vertex form by completing the square

content.text: Completing the square is a method to rewrite a quadratic in vertex form. This reveals the vertex of the parabola and is essential for solving quadratic equations.

content.heading: Perfect Square Trinomials
content.text:
A perfect square trinomial has the form: x² + 2ax + a² = (x + a)²
Example: x² + 6x + 9 = (x + 3)²
The constant term is always (half the coefficient of x)²

content.heading: Steps to Complete the Square
content.text:
For x² + bx:
1. Take half of b: b/2
2. Square it: (b/2)²
3. Add and subtract this value
4. Factor the perfect square trinomial
